short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reads (text to speech) the currently highlighted text on the screen (current tab)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reads the currently highlighted text on the screen; converts highlighted text to speech.

Highlight the text you want to be read and do either of:
- Press [Alt+Shift+S] or
- Click on the extension's icon
